item.title: Millie Bobby Brown, Gabriel LaBelle to Star in Netflix Romantic Comedy ‘Just Picture It’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Lee Toland Krieger, known for helming the drama ‘The Age of Adaline’ and episodes of Netflix’s hit ‘You,’ is directing the feature.

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’: What We Know About the Final Season
item.description: Breaking down the fifth and final run for the Upside Down saga — from new and returning castmembers to what chaos Vecna might bring to the Hawkins crew in the hit Netflix series.
